    async getCrossRefData(keyword, rows, page, selects) {
        const crossRefdata = await this.httpService.axiosRef
            .get((0, util_1.CROSSREF_API_URL)(keyword, rows, page, selects))
            .catch((err) => {

        });

        const totalItems = crossRefdata.data.message['total-results'];

    }
    async crawlAllCrossRefData(keyword, totalItems, rows) {
        if (totalItems >= 10000)
            totalItems = 10000;
        await Promise.all(Array(Math.ceil(totalItems / rows))
            .fill(0)

    }
    parseCrossRefData(items, parser) {
        return items.map(parser).filter((info) => info.title);
    }

        return this.parsePaperInfoDetail(item.data.message);
    }
    async putElasticSearch(paper) {
        return await this.esService.index({
            index: process.env.ELASTIC_INDEX,
            id: paper.doi,
            document: Object.assign({}, paper),
        });
    }
    async getElasticSearch(keyword, size = 5) {
        const query = {
            bool: {
                should: [
                    {
                        match_bool_prefix: {
                            title: {
                                query: keyword,
                            },
                        },
                    },
                    {
                        match_bool_prefix: {
                            author: {
                                query: keyword,
                            },
                        },
                    },
                ],
            },
        };
        return await this.esService
            .search({
            index: process.env.ELASTIC_INDEX,
            size,
            query,
        })
            .catch(() => {
            return { hits: { hits: [], total: 0 } };
        });
    }
    async getCacheFromCrossRef(url) {
        try {
            const crossRefdata = await this.httpService.axiosRef.get(url);
            const items = crossRefdata.data.message.items;
            const papers = this.parseCrossRefData(items, this.parsePaperInfoExtended);
            papers.map((paper) => {
                this.putElasticSearch(paper);
            });
        }

    }
